pracharanaya pilibanda pilip kotlarge sankalpayata anuwa "pracharanaya yanu mudal gewanu labu anugrahakathwayak mangin meheyawana apaudgalika sanniwedana ratawak" lesa nirwachanaya kara atha. 1 pracharanaye aramunu 2 pracharana ithihasaya 3 madhyayan 4 aawrutha danwimkaranaya 5 pracharana madhya pilibanda mahajana awabodhaya 6 pracharana madhyayak thora ganima 7 pracharana warga 8 rupawahini welanda danwim 9 jangama welada danwim pracharanaya 9.1 podujana sewa pracharanayan 10 madhyaya saha welada danwim 11 pracharanaye ahithakala balapama 12 pracharana regulasi 13 goliya pracharana kalamanakaranaya 14 nawa prawanatha 15 pracharanaye anagathaya 16 adhika pramanaye prathilabha gananaya kirima pracharanaye aramunu[sanskaranaya karanna] paudgalika wikunum wadi kara ganima wikunum wiyadam adu kirima wyaparaya wyaptha kirima prachalitha kirima ha pulul kirimata hakiyawa labima poduwe wishala paribhogika pirisakata ekawara langawime hakiyawa bhanda beda harimata niyochithayan soya ganime hakiyawa nawa weledapolawal wala aluth paribhogikayan soya gatha hakiwima anekuth bhandawala thathwayan soyagena thamage bhandaya usas thathwayakata gena eeme hakiyawa tharangakarithwayata muhunadime hakiyawa labima pracharana ithihasaya[sanskaranaya karanna] purana arabiye pawathi wanija paniwida saha deshapalana satan pradarshana kirime krama pilibandawa natabun asurin purawidyathmaka sakshi soya gena atha.
koti ee himiyan ghathanaya kirimata ekala pansala asala bombha atawa thibinu athara pasuwa hamuda aarakshawa sumana himiyanta himi wiya.
ee aleksandar heliyos (suryaya) saha kliyopatra selin (chandraya) yana dedenayi.
